attributes.action: Put in speed control measures on Doe Bank Lane.
attributes.additional_details: People are constantly speeding up this road and recently killed a dog and injured an elderly lady walking her dog. There needs to be some measures put in place to stop racers racing up this road.
attributes.background: Place some speed control measures on Doe Bank Lane, Great Barr, Birmingham.

rejection.details:
Decisions about traffic calming on local roads are a matter for individual local authorities, not the Government or House of Commons.

You could start a petition with Coventry City Council about this: https://www.coventry.gov.uk/petitions
